message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a high-quality item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality of your product. I would like to propose a price of $90 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think the product is worth more than that.
I understand your perspective, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $100 for the product.
